Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to mechanical problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to mechanical problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81W

#90 Harlem

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
